participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is a passionate and dedicated bee farmer, who enjoys the simplicity of nature and has a keen interest in unique foods.
participant_1.background: my name is george. i'm a bee farmer. my favorite food is papaya. i've zero family that i'm close to. i married a super model from italy.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is adventurous and creative, with a love for animals and a knack for restoring classic cars.
participant_2.background: i have two dogs. i like to work on vintage cars. my favorite music is country. i own two vintage mustangs.
